                                           |
                                           +----gjt.ProgressDialog
public class ProgressDialog
extends GJTDialog
A dialog that uses a bargauge to indicate progress made on a task that presumably takes some time to complete.

See Also:
GJTDialog, Bargauge, DialogTest

ProgressDialog(Frame, DialogClient, String, Color)
ProgressDialog(Frame, DialogClient, String, Color, boolean)
